result.eng: How long did you stay in France?
result.ga: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa Fhrainc
result.orig: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa Fhrainc
result.html: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa FhraincHow long did you stay in France?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a d'ḟan tú sa ḞraincHow long did you stay in France?

result.ga: Is as an bhFrainc mé féin
result.orig: Is as an bhFrainc mé féin
result.html: Is as an bhFrainc mé féinI, myself, am from France.
result.ponchtml: Is as an ḃFrainc mé féinI, myself, am from France.

result.eng: I'd love to go to France this summer.
result.ga: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seo
result.orig: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seo
result.html: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seoI'd love to go to France this summer.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom dul go dtí an Ḟrainc an saṁraḋ seoI'd love to go to France this summer.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.orig: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an Fhrainc
result.html: Nuair a bhí sé 11 bliain d'aois bhog an teaghlach go léir go dtí an FhraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí sé 11 bliain d'aois ḃog an teaġlaċ go léir go dtí an ḞraincWhen he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
